    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78809</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Born-Haber cycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Getragene-Haber Schleife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle Soutenu-Haber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo Carregado-Haber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo Sopportato -Haber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεννημένος- Haber κύκλος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo Llevado -Haber</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is third of three diagrams showing the Born-Haber cycle used to measure the lattice enthalpy of some ionic compounds in accordance with Hess's law. Here, the Born-Haber cycle for disodium oxide is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atomisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Born-Haber cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disodium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron affinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat of formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hess's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic compound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lattice enthalpy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">standard enthalpy change</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Third von drei Diagrammen, welche die 
Getragene-Haber Schleife zeigen, die benutzt wird, um die 
Gitterenthalpie einiger Ionenmittel in Übereinstimmung mit Gesetz 
Hesss zu messen. Hier wird die Getragene-Haber Schleife für 
Binatriumoxid gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est tiers de trois diagrammes montrant le cycle
Soutenu-Haber employé pour mesurer l'enthalpie de trellis de quelques
composés ioniques selon la loi de Hess. Ici, le cycle 
Soutenu-Haber pour l'oxyde disodique est montré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é third de três diagramas que mostram o 
ciclo Carregado-Haber usado medir o enthalpy do lattice de alguns 
compostos ionic de acordo com a lei de Hess. Aqui, o ciclo 
Carregado-Haber para o óxido disodium é mostrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un terzo di tre schemi che mostrano il 
ciclo Sopportato -Haber usato per misurare l'entalpia della grata di 
alcuni residui ionici in conformità con legge del Hess. Qui, il
ciclo Sopportato -Haber per l'ossido disodico è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι τρίτο τριών διαγραμμάτων που εμφανίζουν 
κύκλο γεννημένος- Haber που χρησιμοποιείται για να μετρήσει την
ενθαλπία δικτυωτού πλέγματος μερικών ιοντικών ενώσεων σύμφωνα 
με το νόμο Hess. Εδώ, ο κύκλος γεννημένος- Haber για 
το disodium οξείδιο εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es tercero de tres diagramas que muestran 
el ciclo Llevado -Haber usado para medir la entalpia del cedazo de 
algunos compuestos iónicos de acuerdo con la ley de Hess. 
Aquí, el ciclo Llevado -Haber para el óxido disodium se 
muestra.</string>
          </description>
